item.title: There’s Always More to It!
item.description: Think you’ve seen it all? There’s always more beneath the surface. Watch as unexpected twists and details reveal the full story.

media:content.media:title: There’s Always More to It!
media:content.media:description: Think you’ve seen it all? There’s always more beneath the surface. Watch as unexpected twists and details reveal the full story.

item.title: This Lotus Is Surprisingly Tiny!
item.description: Check out this tiny Lotus! Small in size but big on style and performance, it’s a unique car that turns heads wherever it goes.

item.title: AC Not Working and Making Noise!
item.description: The AC is acting up with loud, troubling noises! Watch the issue unfold and see the steps taken to diagnose and fix the problem.

item.title: Car Wizard’s Picks: Best & Worst School Cars
item.description: Car Wizard shares his picks for the best and worst school cars, explaining reliability, safety, costs, and what students and parents should avoid or consider.

item.title: Dealer’s Mistake Nearly Broke This Lexus LX450
item.description: A costly dealer error that almost ruined a Lexus LX450, showing what went wrong, the damage it caused, and how the issue was identified before it got worse.

item.title: Should You Buy One of These?
item.description: A review and evaluation of a specific vehicle or item, highlighting pros, cons, and key considerations to help viewers decide if it’s worth purchasing.

item.title: When Does Oil Leakage Become a Problem?
item.description: Explains when engine oil leaks turn serious, highlighting warning signs, potential damage, and why timely maintenance is crucial to prevent costly repairs.

item.title: An Issue That Can Cause an Accident
item.description: Highlighting a vehicle problem with serious safety risks, showing the issue, potential consequences, and the importance of addressing it promptly to prevent accidents.

item.title: This Car Has Been Well Looked After
item.description: Showcasing a vehicle in excellent condition, highlighting careful maintenance, attention to detail, and the care that keeps it running smoothly and looking great.

item.title: The Fox Body Mustang
item.description: A look at the iconic Fox Body Mustang, highlighting its design, performance, and why it remains a beloved classic among car enthusiasts and collectors.

item.title: It Started Up… and Then It Died!
item.description: A vehicle moment where the engine starts but immediately dies, showing diagnosis, troubleshooting, and the steps taken to identify and fix the problem.

item.title: Can I Tell My Customer? It’s Shockingly Bad!
item.description: Can I Tell My Customer What's Wrong? It's Shockingly BAD!A vehicle issue so severe it’s shocking, showing the problem, diagnosis, and the dilemma of explaining the costly or surprising repair to the customer.

item.title: The Best SUV on the Road
item.description: Highlighting the top features, performance, and reliability of an outstanding SUV, showing why it stands out as the best choice for drivers.

item.title: This Lexus Runs So Well!
item.description: Showcasing a Lexus with impressive performance and reliability, highlighting smooth operation, maintenance, and why it stands out among other vehicles.

item.title: 25 Years Wrenching: Never Seen This AC Problem
item.description: A rare and unexpected AC issue discovered after 25 years of experience, showing diagnosis, repair challenges, and the surprising solution.

item.title: Is This Cadillac Worth Fixing?
item.description: Evaluating a Cadillac’s condition to determine if repairs are worthwhile, highlighting potential issues, costs, and the decision-making process for restoration.

item.title: The Story of This Car!
item.description: A deep dive into a car’s history, showing its past ownership, journey, and unique features that make it memorable or noteworthy.

item.title: I Refuse to Fix This VW Tiguan
item.description: A frustrating VW Tiguan repair scenario, showing why the vehicle is a challenge, highlighting issues, and explaining the decision to walk away from fixing it.

item.title: 190K Mile BMW X5 Surprised Me!
item.description: A high-mileage BMW X5 that exceeded expectations, showing surprising performance and reliability—even for someone who isn’t a fan of BMWs.

item.title: Things to Know Before Changing a Timing Belt
item.description: Essential tips and precautions for changing a timing belt, showing what to check, tools needed, and common mistakes to avoid for a successful repair.
